text: læa meụ̄̀x dị̂ t̄hū kl̀āw kæ̀ phwk k̄heā ẁā phwk th̀ān cng ṣ̄rạthṭhā yeī̀yng thī̀ prachāchn k̄heā ṣ̄rạthṭhā kạn si phwk k̄heā k̆ kl̀āw ẁā ca h̄ı̂ reā ṣ̄rạthṭhā yeī̀yng p̄hū̂ c̄hod k̄helā h̄el̀ā nận ṣ̄rạthṭhā kạn kra nạ̀n h̄rụ̄x? Phụng rū̂ t̄heid ẁā phwk k̄heā xeng nạ̀nh̄æla pĕn p̄hū̂ thī̀ c̄hod k̄helā tæ̀ phwk k̄heā h̄ā rū̂ mị̀
